Header: Suwa Sariya Ambulance service to Eastern Province
Content: Arrangements have been made to launch Suwa Sariya Ambulance Service by March in the Eastern Province.The Suwa Sariya Ambulance Service which is being operated on Indian Government aid, has been able to save lives of many patients. The ambulance service is in operation now at eight provinces. The Suwa Sariya Foundation said that the service will be made available in all provinces with the aim of providing an extensive service to the public free of charge.
